Title: JT-HW3.ans.html
Body: 001010                                    001010 x 111100                                  x 000011 --------                                  -------- ANSWER 111111111100 <-  sign extend the -4 10 001010 <-  10 10 x 1010 <-  10 10 x 000011 <-   3 10 ------------                                  -------- 1111111111000                                    001010 111111111100                                      001010 ----------------                                  -------- 1001111111011000 <- 011000 is 24 10 0011110 <-  011110 is 30 10 in 6 bit, 2's comp                         in 6 bit, 2's comp 111111011000 is -40 in 12 bit 2's comp,            no overflow in 12 or 6 bits no overflow for 12 bit words but overflow for 6 bit words (4) (4 points) Show that the following two code segments give the same value for c, for any values of a and b.
